lead_paragraph: A year after achieving the franchise’s first winning record, the Texans expect to reach the playoffs and even, receiver Andre Johnson said, the Super Bowl.
snippet: A year after achieving the franchise’s first winning record, the Texans expect to reach the playoffs and even, receiver Andre Johnson said, the Super Bowl.

headline.main: Texans’ Fortunes Rise, as Do Expectations
headline.seo: Houston’s Fortunes Rise, As Do Its Expectations
headline.print_headline: Texans’ Fortunes Rise, As Do Expectations
